cocktail_reviews.Review: I will never buy bottled Gluehwein again (it's so hard to find anyway)! Just the smell of this takes me back to Munich’s Christmas Market (Christkindlmarkt) that I visited as a child. Thank you so much!

cocktail_reviews.Name: Gluehwein
cocktail_reviews.Review: This recipe was excellent. I used local plum wine for the red wine, which made the drink wonderfully sweet!

cocktail_reviews.Name: Gluehwein
cocktail_reviews.Review: This is a wonderful drink by the fire when you have spent the day out in the cool, brisk air looking for that Christmas tree:~) It is one of my fondest memories of Germany....sipping on a warm cup, trekking through the Christkindle Markt taking in the sights and smells of Munchen! If you can get the wine "Bulls Blood" in your area, (I believe it is a Hungarian red wine) it absolutely will make the best gluehwein! When I make my Gluehwein, I slice the orange and place the cloves within the orange. Everyone has there own way of making it though, that is just my preference. Try this, you will LOVE IT!

cocktail_reviews.Name: Gluehwein
cocktail_reviews.Review: I was in Frankfurt, Germany last year for their Christmas Market. All you can smell is Gluehwein, there is a vendor every few feet. It was the best thing I had ever tasted! This recipe is extactly like I remember it.

cocktail_reviews.Name: Gluehwein
cocktail_reviews.Review: Excellent. I made this using two tangerines, about 16 cloves, and half a teaspoon of ground cinnamon. The citrus tends to get a bit of pulp into the wine, so strain it before serving if you mind pulp. Also, if you're serving this to people who don't usually drink wine, I recommend using a sweet wine like Shiraz -- I used a (dry) burgundy and even with the sugar, the initial taste was quite tart when the wine was served hot. This keeps well refrigerated -- just warm in the microwave when you want to serve it.

cocktail_reviews.Name: Gluehwein
cocktail_reviews.Review: Outstanding!!! I made this recipe with two 1.5 L bottles of Merlot/Cabernet Sauvignon. I quadrupled the rest of the ingredients and subsituted orange juice for the water. After simmering the juice mixture I transfered it to the crock pot set on high and added the wine. After it was hot I kept it warm. It happened to be Halloween and 30 degrees outside so I offered "to go" cups to the parents of the trick or treaters! They loved it! This is a fabulous recipe and one that I will make throughout the holidays! Thanks for sharing!

cocktail_reviews.Name: Gluehwein
cocktail_reviews.Review: I made this for New Year's and even friends who don't like wine thought this was good.

cocktail_reviews.Name: Gluehwein
cocktail_reviews.Review: This was my contribution to a house party I attended. I used Merlot that I bottle myself and substituted 1/2 the water with Tropicana orange juice. I also removed the simmering oranges from the pot, removed the cloves, sliced the oranges into thick slivers and returned them to the pot. I then transferred everything to a crock pot to keep warm. It was a great hit with the guests and I will certainly make it again, and again. Many thanks for this keeper.

cocktail_reviews.Name: Gluehwein
cocktail_reviews.Review: I normally am not a wine drinker, but I was having guests for Christmas, one of whom is of German ancestry (my brother-in-law), and I wanted to serve something a little differentand special. This was a big hit; even I loved it. The only thing I changed in the recipe was that I substituted orange juice for the water. My brother-in-law commented that it tasted just like his late mother's recipe. Quite a compliment.

cocktail_reviews.Name: Gluehwein
cocktail_reviews.Review: Very tasty and the wine is quite a bit stronger than you might expect! My family loved it on a cold December night!

cocktail_reviews.Name: Gluehwein
cocktail_reviews.Review: WOWEE! This is good stuff! We had this on Christmas and on New Year's Eve and it was a hit both times. We used merlot and it turned out great. The only thing is that I could never get it to the syrupy stage so we just added the wine after simmering awhile. You won't be disappointed!

cocktail_reviews.Name: Gluehwein
cocktail_reviews.Review: Yummy!!!

cocktail_reviews.Name: Gluehwein
cocktail_reviews.Review: I've been looking for a recipe for this since I left Austria! I went there in 1996 to visit my friends who live in Vienna, and I had this in Krungel (a town where Badmitterndorf ski school is located) and it was great after skiing all day! Thanks and we enjoy it!

cocktail_reviews.Name: Gluehwein
cocktail_reviews.Review: I'm not German, and have never heard of this drink before. But, just by looking at the ingredients I knew it would be yummy. Sure, enough...I made it for all of my friends and now they're all asking me for the recipe! THANK YOU!!

cocktail_reviews.Name: Gluehwein
cocktail_reviews.Review: Absolutely great recipe for the traditional German Gluehwein! I served this just yesterday (12/20/03) and everyone loved it. I did add just a little orange juice, just because I used very strong homemade wine! Thank you for this recipe...will use it again next year!

cocktail_reviews.Name: Gluehwein
cocktail_reviews.Review: I'm not a fan of red wine and so I used blush. I have also used white wine and it has come out great. I also add 1 Tbls lemon juice, 2 sticks of cinnamon and no water. Very good!

cocktail_reviews.Name: Gluehwein
cocktail_reviews.Review: As someone who lives in Germany, this is the biggest holiday hit you can find! It is available everywhere in towns and the popular christmas markets and this is exactly how to make it. Although, I wouldn't add the water, but instead substitute orange juice to give it more of a zest. Drink it while it's hot!

cocktail_reviews.Name: Gluehwein
cocktail_reviews.Review: This recipe is definately one to keep! We thoroughly enjoyed it after being out in the cold working all day! Thanks.

cocktail_reviews.Name: Gluehwein
cocktail_reviews.Review: Great as a reception beverage to serve guests on a cold day. This was different and tasty, great during the holidays.

cocktail_reviews.Name: Gluehwein
cocktail_reviews.Review: I've used this several times already and can't believe how good it is, thanks.

cocktail_reviews.Name: Gluehwein
cocktail_reviews.Review: Delicious, sweet and warm

cocktail_reviews.Name: Gluehwein
cocktail_reviews.Review: Made this recipe between Christmas and New Year 2000 and it went down a treat. I'll definitely be making it again. Advice... drink it whilst it is still warm; when it cools it's just not the same.

cocktail_reviews.Name: Gluehwein
cocktail_reviews.Review: Thank you for this recipe. I was in Germany 74-77 and have been looking for this recipe. Again Thank you. And Merry Christmas!

cocktail_reviews.Name: Ultimate Frozen Strawberry Margarita
cocktail_reviews.Review: Delicious! The day after the Super Bowl the syruped strawberries were sold out. I added 1/8 C. of sugar to unsweetened frozen strawberries. The ideal blend of sweet and tart! Super easy for a usual wine drinker.

cocktail_reviews.Name: Ultimate Frozen Strawberry Margarita
cocktail_reviews.Review: OMG My first time making a Strawberry Margarita and this recipe was the very best! I did as one person said and doubled the amount of strawberries and it was the best margarita I've had in years! it was so easy too! I love it!

cocktail_reviews.Name: Ultimate Frozen Strawberry Margarita
cocktail_reviews.Review: This is the BEST frozen strawberry margarita recipe! E V E R!! The only thing that we changed was the triple sec, we added margarita mix. We have used Jose Quervo gold and 818 tequila. It is definitely a must to try!

cocktail_reviews.Name: Ultimate Frozen Strawberry Margarita
cocktail_reviews.Review: came out perfect, recipe very simple

cocktail_reviews.Name: Ultimate Frozen Strawberry Margarita
cocktail_reviews.Review: Perfect amount for 4 margarita glasses. Not too strong, not too sweet! Everyone loved them.

cocktail_reviews.Name: Ultimate Frozen Strawberry Margarita
cocktail_reviews.Review: Used fresh strawberries and it was great! Better than going out for sure!

cocktail_reviews.Name: Ultimate Frozen Strawberry Margarita
cocktail_reviews.Review: This margarita is awesome. I did some modifications based on comments from other reviewers. I used 4 oz tequila instead of 6, I used 8oz frozen strawberries with no syrup and I added 1/4 cup of sugar. It was perfect. Strong but not overwhelming. I also added a few pieces of ice to make it more slushy. Everyone enjoyed. The recipe makes 2 margaritas. If you need more than 2, double or triple the recipe.

cocktail_reviews.Name: Ultimate Frozen Strawberry Margarita
cocktail_reviews.Review: This margarita taste great!

cocktail_reviews.Name: Ultimate Frozen Strawberry Margarita
cocktail_reviews.Review: I made this using whole frozen strawberries, agave syrup, and fresh lime juice to reduce the calories and it was delicious. I basically just looked up the recipe to have a guide as to how much alcohol to add.

cocktail_reviews.Name: Ultimate Frozen Strawberry Margarita
cocktail_reviews.Review: Loved it!

cocktail_reviews.Name: Ultimate Frozen Strawberry Margarita
cocktail_reviews.Review: Excellent. Will be using this moving forward! We sometimes throw half a large jalapeno in for a sweet and spicy version.

cocktail_reviews.Name: Ultimate Frozen Strawberry Margarita
cocktail_reviews.Review: I thought this recipe was super easy and good. I used fresh limes and squeezed a little agave in.

cocktail_reviews.Name: Ultimate Frozen Strawberry Margarita
cocktail_reviews.Review: These are the BEST margaritas I have ever had! I wouldn’t change a thing!!

cocktail_reviews.Name: Ultimate Frozen Strawberry Margarita
cocktail_reviews.Review: These are the BEST margaritas I have ever had! I wouldn’t change a thing!!

cocktail_reviews.Name: Ultimate Frozen Strawberry Margarita
cocktail_reviews.Review: fantastic and a huge hit!!!

cocktail_reviews.Name: Ultimate Frozen Strawberry Margarita
cocktail_reviews.Review: This margarita was delicious, and a big hit with everyone! I don’t have any complaints. Didn’t take too much time to prepare either.

cocktail_reviews.Name: Ultimate Frozen Strawberry Margarita
cocktail_reviews.Review: Super yum. I tweaked it to accommodate 2 people. Added a little fresh lime juice and used frozen strawberries sans syrup. I added a touch of light agave instead. Swapped out frozen Limeade with lemonade, and used Cointreau instead of triple sec . Great simple recipe !

cocktail_reviews.Name: Ultimate Frozen Strawberry Margarita
cocktail_reviews.Review: Yummy!

cocktail_reviews.Name: Ultimate Frozen Strawberry Margarita
cocktail_reviews.Review: The best ever! I just used this recipe and just enjoyed the best strawberry margarita ever! I'm giving this 5 stars and would give it more if I could. I'm not one to believe that you should rate a recipe 5 stars, if not followed exactly, HOWEVER, I used organic frozen strawberries and added 2 ounces of strawberry syrup, since my frozen strawberries had no syrup and I still think it deserves 5 stars!!!

cocktail_reviews.Name: Ultimate Frozen Strawberry Margarita
cocktail_reviews.Review: Delicious! My guests enjoyed them!!!

cocktail_reviews.Name: Ultimate Frozen Strawberry Margarita
cocktail_reviews.Review: Perfect Margarita!!!! No changes were needed...

cocktail_reviews.Name: Ultimate Frozen Strawberry Margarita
cocktail_reviews.Review: It was loved by one and all. THe limeade really makes the recipe. When we ran out of strawberries we blended watermelon and that was also delicious.

cocktail_reviews.Name: Ultimate Frozen Strawberry Margarita
cocktail_reviews.Review: so good!

cocktail_reviews.Name: Ultimate Frozen Strawberry Margarita
cocktail_reviews.Review: so good!

cocktail_reviews.Name: Ultimate Frozen Strawberry Margarita
cocktail_reviews.Review: Didn't have the strawberries in syrup just no sugar added and they where still perfect. Put extra in the freezer and had great frozen margarita ices!!!

cocktail_reviews.Name: Ultimate Frozen Strawberry Margarita
cocktail_reviews.Review: Finally, a cocktail recipe that turned out exactly like it was supposed to! So. Good.

cocktail_reviews.Name: Ultimate Frozen Strawberry Margarita
cocktail_reviews.Review: We added frozen strawberries and strawberry concentrate. Amazing!!!

cocktail_reviews.Name: Ultimate Frozen Strawberry Margarita
cocktail_reviews.Review: As awesome as it was 10yrs ago. I don’t drink hard liquor often, but when I do, I go with the best recipe.

cocktail_reviews.Name: Ultimate Frozen Strawberry Margarita
cocktail_reviews.Review: I added 4 oz of tequila instead of 6 and just added sugar to the frozen strawberries to make it syrupy. I got large daiquiri glasses and we ended up with two full glasses. Absolutely delicious. Only problem is that... it doesn’t last long ;-)

cocktail_reviews.Name: Ultimate Frozen Strawberry Margarita
cocktail_reviews.Review: This is fantastic! I varied the recipe and used fresh strawberry, blueberry, and raspberry. It was great with and without sugar. Thank you for posting it!

cocktail_reviews.Name: Ultimate Frozen Strawberry Margarita
cocktail_reviews.Review: I added 15ml agave nectar. Really good on a hot day.

cocktail_reviews.Name: Ultimate Frozen Strawberry Margarita
cocktail_reviews.Review: Omg simply delicious!!!!

cocktail_reviews.Name: Ultimate Frozen Strawberry Margarita
cocktail_reviews.Review: Very good. A little tart but still good.

cocktail_reviews.Name: Ultimate Frozen Strawberry Margarita
cocktail_reviews.Review: Perfect combination of tequila and triple sec. I have a Margaritalville blender and this recipe made the perfect Margarita! I used Pomagranite juice instead of strawberries. YUMMY!

cocktail_reviews.Name: Ultimate Frozen Strawberry Margarita
cocktail_reviews.Review: Delicious ! No changes, we loved it

cocktail_reviews.Name: Ultimate Frozen Strawberry Margarita
cocktail_reviews.Review: I love this margarita. Will definitely be making again.

cocktail_reviews.Name: Ultimate Frozen Strawberry Margarita
cocktail_reviews.Review: Delicious. Used a Ninja drink blender and it came out a perfect, smooth slush. Cointreau and Cazadores tequila were my choices along with generic limeade concentrate and a cup filled with frozen strawberries then poured over Daily's strawberry mix to the cup mark. It turned out strong but balanced and very drinkable.

cocktail_reviews.Name: Ultimate Frozen Strawberry Margarita
cocktail_reviews.Review: This is one of my favorite drinks. It’s very easy to make and has become a staple at dinner parties in summer.

cocktail_reviews.Name: Ultimate Frozen Strawberry Margarita
cocktail_reviews.Review: This is a foolproof recipe. Always tastes great and simple to make.

cocktail_reviews.Name: Ultimate Frozen Strawberry Margarita
cocktail_reviews.Review: This was great! My best friend always talks about how great the margaritas at the Mexican restaurant near our house are and how she wishes she could get the recipe. She said this recipe was better! I did add 1/2 cup of sugar to make it extra sweet

cocktail_reviews.Name: Ultimate Frozen Strawberry Margarita
cocktail_reviews.Review: This is soooo good! And so easy! We keep making this, love it!

cocktail_reviews.Name: Ultimate Frozen Strawberry Margarita
cocktail_reviews.Review: Awesome! Made it with fresh cut strawberries cut up in sugar and used the syrup as well - - used a bit more strawberries than called for. Will make this all summer!

cocktail_reviews.Name: Ultimate Frozen Strawberry Margarita
cocktail_reviews.Review: Definitely will make it again, it's so much better than pre made mixes.

cocktail_reviews.Name: Ultimate Frozen Strawberry Margarita
cocktail_reviews.Review: So good! I cut back the tequila to 4 oz and bumped the triple sec up to 3 because I didn't want the drinks very strong. Easy & delicious!

cocktail_reviews.Name: Ultimate Frozen Strawberry Margarita
cocktail_reviews.Review: Loved it!!!

cocktail_reviews.Name: Ultimate Frozen Strawberry Margarita
cocktail_reviews.Review: This was a huge hit with my strawberry margarita loving friends. It even converted me, who prefers lime margaritas over fruity ones. I did add a little extra strawberries per other reviews. It's my new go to strawberry margarita recipe!

cocktail_reviews.Name: Ultimate Frozen Strawberry Margarita
cocktail_reviews.Review: A friend dropped by and asked me to make her a frozen strawberry margarita like the one she had on her recent Florida vacation. A Google search found me this recipe. I did modify it slightly by using 4 oz of fresh lime juice and added 2 oz of cane sugar syrup for sweetness (instead of limeade). It went over well with my guests. Two pitchers full well received. Would have made more but ran out of limes, strawberries and Tequila. Refreshed my stock today!!!!

cocktail_reviews.Name: Ultimate Frozen Strawberry Margarita
cocktail_reviews.Review: After working all day on home improvements, my family and I were thirsty. Looked up some recipes, and this came up. It did its job well. I am buzzed and it tasted great. Alcohol was at a reasonable level for one that drinks. Great Job!!

cocktail_reviews.Name: Ultimate Frozen Strawberry Margarita
cocktail_reviews.Review: I loved this margarita! I actually used a very cheap tequila too so I can't imagine how a nicer brand would taste! I also used lime juice to make the sugar rim and it worked perfectly.

cocktail_reviews.Name: Ultimate Frozen Strawberry Margarita
cocktail_reviews.Review: Super easy to make and great margaritas. Not over-powering, even for my alcohol sensitive wife. Using a good tequila helps a bunch. I will make exactly as written again.

cocktail_reviews.Name: Ultimate Frozen Strawberry Margarita
cocktail_reviews.Review: Tasted like a restaurant margarita - I don't have a large blender so I cut the recipe in half and made it in my Nutribullet. So easy, fast and delicious!

cocktail_reviews.Name: Ultimate Frozen Strawberry Margarita
cocktail_reviews.Review: absolutely a delicious drink

cocktail_reviews.Name: Ultimate Frozen Strawberry Margarita
cocktail_reviews.Review: Was delicious but the alcohol was very dominate in this drink. Will definitely use maybe half the amount suggested. Was way too strong but still the flavor was great

cocktail_reviews.Name: Ultimate Frozen Strawberry Margarita
cocktail_reviews.Review: I love a good strawberry margarita and this is delicious

cocktail_reviews.Name: Ultimate Frozen Strawberry Margarita
cocktail_reviews.Review: Quick easy and delicious!!!!

cocktail_reviews.Name: Ultimate Frozen Strawberry Margarita
cocktail_reviews.Review: This was sooo good! Will be making again and again...lol

cocktail_reviews.Name: Ultimate Frozen Strawberry Margarita
cocktail_reviews.Review: It was a hit! Perfect flavor!

cocktail_reviews.Name: Ultimate Frozen Strawberry Margarita
cocktail_reviews.Review: I made no changes and it was a hit. So good perfect for a hot summer barbecue.

cocktail_reviews.Name: Ultimate Frozen Strawberry Margarita
cocktail_reviews.Review: Very good strawberry margarita! I used strawberry's from Food Lion that had splenda in them. Changed the flavor a little bit but cut back on the sugar and calories.

cocktail_reviews.Name: Ultimate Frozen Strawberry Margarita
cocktail_reviews.Review: These were amazing!! I had four of them down before I even realized it!! I made them for a Mexican dinner I made for some family and they were a huge hit!! We had two pitchers gone between four of us in no time!! I used fresh strawberries that I added sugar to the night before and it turned out great!!!

cocktail_reviews.Name: Ultimate Frozen Strawberry Margarita
cocktail_reviews.Review: This was fantastic! Used just a bit less tequila and triple sec and it was perfect!

cocktail_reviews.Name: Ultimate Frozen Strawberry Margarita
cocktail_reviews.Review: No changes made. This was delicious. Made it for me and my boyfriend and he loved it too. I just sat the blender on the table instead of the refridgerator

cocktail_reviews.Name: Ultimate Frozen Strawberry Margarita
cocktail_reviews.Review: My go to and I woudln't change a thing. I keep all the ingredients on hand so to make at any time. I will sometimes make without adding the strawberries in syrup for a lime version, still just as good.

cocktail_reviews.Name: Ultimate Frozen Strawberry Margarita
cocktail_reviews.Review: It was ok I have definitely had better margaritas. I will stick to fresh strawberries in the future, I felt like using frozen just did not have the same strawberry flavor as using fresh does leaving the drink tasting a little watery.

cocktail_reviews.Name: Ultimate Frozen Strawberry Margarita
cocktail_reviews.Review: Delish! I did add some extra strawberries, but oh so good! Will definitely make them again.

cocktail_reviews.Name: Ultimate Frozen Strawberry Margarita
cocktail_reviews.Review: Also worked with whole frozen strawberries. added a little extra sugar since I didn't have the strawberry syrup.

cocktail_reviews.Name: Ultimate Frozen Strawberry Margarita
cocktail_reviews.Review: Tastes like it came from a Mexican restaurant! I was pleased with the turnout. I wish it was a little thicker though. I put 4 ounces of tequila instead of 6 and it was plenty!

cocktail_reviews.Name: Ultimate Frozen Strawberry Margarita
cocktail_reviews.Review: Mighty Fine !!

cocktail_reviews.Name: Ultimate Frozen Strawberry Margarita
cocktail_reviews.Review: This is the Ultimate Strawberry Margarita! The only change I made was to add a little Stevia and use Lime Juice instead of Limeade, to cut down on the sugar.

cocktail_reviews.Name: Ultimate Frozen Strawberry Margarita
cocktail_reviews.Review: Fantastic.. I did the strawberries without the syrup. Still tastes perfect!

cocktail_reviews.Name: Ultimate Frozen Strawberry Margarita
cocktail_reviews.Review: This was the best-tasting strawberry margarita I ever had!!! Varied the recipe for 4 servings as follows: 4 oz of fresh squeezed lime juice with pulp instead of the lime concentrate; 4 oz of tequila (used Alacran tequila - tequila blanco, 100% agave and 40% alcohol; any tequila blanco or white tequila will work) instead of 6 oz; increased triple sec Cointreanu from 2 oz to 4 oz; increased unsweetened frozen strawberries from 8 oz to 10 oz; added about 2-3 tablespoons of azucar morena to taste; placed all ingredients in the blender and added crushed ice until it was filled. Thanks for sharing the recipe and reviews! vgomezquita

cocktail_reviews.Name: Ultimate Frozen Strawberry Margarita
cocktail_reviews.Review: Had to triple the strawberries and it still wwasn't enough strawberry flavor. Barely taste the tequila,too.

cocktail_reviews.Name: Ultimate Frozen Strawberry Margarita
cocktail_reviews.Review: this was by far the best ever...my husband absolutely loved it and my daughters said it was the best they have ever tasted...I don't drink, so I went on their recommendations...they are a very critical crew so I always defer to their tastes! LOVED IT

cocktail_reviews.Name: Ultimate Frozen Strawberry Margarita
cocktail_reviews.Review: Definitely an ultimate margarita! A big hit at get togethers.

cocktail_reviews.Name: Ultimate Frozen Strawberry Margarita
cocktail_reviews.Review: Good but use frozen or fresh strawberries without sugar! You could use simple syrup for more sweetness BUT I found the sugar in the lime concentrate to be sweet enough for me! Rub rim of glass with a slice of lime before adding sugar!

cocktail_reviews.Name: Ultimate Frozen Strawberry Margarita
cocktail_reviews.Review: Never made these before. Was in the mood and found this recipe. Due to the reviews, I followed the recipe with the sweetened strawberries, and added frozen strawberries and less ice. Awesome! We are on the fourth pitcher!

cocktail_reviews.Name: Ultimate Frozen Strawberry Margarita
cocktail_reviews.Review: Best strawberry margarita ever!!

cocktail_reviews.Name: Ultimate Frozen Strawberry Margarita
cocktail_reviews.Review: Perfection!

cocktail_reviews.Name: Ultimate Frozen Strawberry Margarita
cocktail_reviews.Review: Everyone loved it, including the kids (virgin).

cocktail_reviews.Name: Ultimate Frozen Strawberry Margarita
cocktail_reviews.Review: First time making a Margarita - it will not be my last!! The only thing I changed was to use fresh strawberries - 3 cups to 1/4 cup sugar - semi froze them and added ALL of them into the blender - which did cut down a bit on the ice...maybe 4+ cups of ice. My Favorite Five (the girls I work with) LOVED them!!! They were so impressed - especially since they know that I have never mixed a drink before in my life....and that has been a long time ;) I mix everything together (except Ice) and freeze. When ready to use I thaw and blend with ice.

cocktail_reviews.Name: Ultimate Frozen Strawberry Margarita
cocktail_reviews.Review: Even the guys skipped their beers and drank these. Soooo yummy.

cocktail_reviews.Name: Ultimate Frozen Strawberry Margarita
cocktail_reviews.Review: This makes for a great Margarita! Sugar or salt on the glass works. I used Orange flavored Triple Sec, and added whipped cream to the top of the finished product. Rave reviews. Infinitely cheaper than what you'd pay at a restaurant, yet every bit as good

cocktail_reviews.Name: Ultimate Frozen Strawberry Margarita
cocktail_reviews.Review: Delicious! I used the whole can of limeade and adjusted the other ingredients accordingly. I blended everything up (minus the ice), and froze it in a container in the freezer. When I needed it, it was perfectly slushy and delicious. A definite keeper~YUM! Thanks for sharing. :)

cocktail_reviews.Name: Ultimate Frozen Strawberry Margarita
cocktail_reviews.Review: I made these for our Fantasy Football draft. Being the only girl in the league, I thought I'd get the whole pitcher. The beer drinking guys loved them! Buy more supplies than you think you'll need.

cocktail_reviews.Name: Ultimate Frozen Strawberry Margarita
cocktail_reviews.Review: I did a virgin strawberry margarita and it turned out great. Had to add some water to make up for the lack of liquid but still turned out great!

cocktail_reviews.Name: Ultimate Frozen Strawberry Margarita
cocktail_reviews.Review: Great! Will make again and again! I add extra lime just because I like the citrus taste but this recipe rocks!

cocktail_reviews.Name: Ultimate Frozen Strawberry Margarita
cocktail_reviews.Review: It was ok... not great.

cocktail_reviews.Name: Ultimate Frozen Strawberry Margarita
cocktail_reviews.Review: This is the very best formula. Also I sub rum for tequila for a Dacquiri. I have used one pound of frozen ,no sugar berries. If you like less sugar .bill mandell

cocktail_reviews.Name: Ultimate Frozen Strawberry Margarita
cocktail_reviews.Review: These are delicious! I put it all in the blender at once and it was so easy. The people who did not rate them well need to learn that this is the kind of recipe you tweek to your liking. If you think it has too much alcohol or not enough, change the amount! For my preferences, this margharita was perfect. Also, none of us thought it was too sweet. There's enough techila to tone down the sweetness in the other ingredients. Just play with it. If you are worried about the frozen strawberries with syrup being too sweet, use only 4 oz of them and add either plain frozen or fresh berries. It's not hard people. Don't lower the rating of the recipe by several stars just because all of us have different taste buds.

cocktail_reviews.Name: Ultimate Frozen Strawberry Margarita
cocktail_reviews.Review: Very good drink; we use 2 oz of frozen strawberry punch concentrate and 2 oz of limeade, to bring out the strawberry flavor. We also coat the glasses with sugar instead of salt. Because the drink is so fruity, we make a batch w/o tequila for the kids, or pour them some before adding a little less tequila for our drinks. Also, a good orange liqueur will work as a substitute for triple sec.

cocktail_reviews.Name: Ultimate Frozen Strawberry Margarita
cocktail_reviews.Review: Tweaked this recipe a bit after reading others on the Internet. Why aren't the ingredients measured in ounces, like every other drink recipe??????????

cocktail_reviews.Name: Ultimate Frozen Strawberry Margarita
cocktail_reviews.Review: Fantastic! We made a triple batch for our Cinco de Mayo fiesta! I mixed up all the ingredients (except the ice) the night before, put it in a Ziploc and put it in the freezer. We crushed up a blender full of ice, poured 1/3 of the mixture in, stirred it and then spooned it into our glasses. Repeated twice throughout the night! HUGE hit! Can't wait to experiment with other flavor combos all summer long!

cocktail_reviews.Name: Ultimate Frozen Strawberry Margarita
cocktail_reviews.Review: I usually don't rate recipes but this is really good. Highly recommend it. I added a few fresh strawberries to the recipe. You will love it.

cocktail_reviews.Name: Ultimate Frozen Strawberry Margarita
cocktail_reviews.Review: Made with fresh strawberries, just slice them put them in a ziplock bag with just enough sugar to coat and freeze them. I can't tell you how many times I heard our guest say, "Dang these are good margaritas".

cocktail_reviews.Name: Ultimate Frozen Strawberry Margarita
cocktail_reviews.Review: Excellent margarita recipe! At last, I have found "my" drink. Strong enough to kick my butt, but delicious enough to enjoy getting there. I just cannot rave about this drink enough. And it was so easy! I never try mixing drinks, but this one turned out delicious on the first attempt just by following the easy directions. So great!

cocktail_reviews.Name: Ultimate Frozen Strawberry Margarita
cocktail_reviews.Review: This is a great frozen margarita recipe. It was ridiculously easy to make and tasted so good! My sister-in-law noted that many times strawberry margaritas can be too sweet. However, the lime in this margarita recipe provides some tartness that balances it out. I will definitely use this recipe again.

cocktail_reviews.Name: Ultimate Frozen Strawberry Margarita
cocktail_reviews.Review: I love the recipe, but I used the frozen the first time, and I had to double it to get strawberry flavor. The next time I used about 10 fresh strawberries and some juice from the frozen, and that helped. I like the recipe, but you need to decide where your flavor is with the strawberry. Good luck.

cocktail_reviews.Name: Ultimate Frozen Strawberry Margarita
cocktail_reviews.Review: Love this recipe! Just perfect! I get compliments on it all the time!

cocktail_reviews.Name: Ultimate Frozen Strawberry Margarita
cocktail_reviews.Review: Excellent. Thanks for sharing.

cocktail_reviews.Name: Ultimate Frozen Strawberry Margarita
cocktail_reviews.Review: This is so delicious!! It taste exactly like the one they serve at a popular local Mexican resteraunt we go to!! Very refreshing!Try it,you will be happy you did!!

cocktail_reviews.Name: Ultimate Frozen Strawberry Margarita
cocktail_reviews.Review: They taste great. I'm not much of a tequila drinker so I only did 4 oz of tequila. Only downside is the morning after...so much sugar = nasty hangover. EDIT: I'm here to update and tell you all that I think the culprit of hangovers is the triple sec. Last night we did these bad boys and only used the tequila, strawberries, and frozen limeade and feeling perfectly fine today. :)

cocktail_reviews.Name: Ultimate Frozen Strawberry Margarita
cocktail_reviews.Review: Absolutely outstanding recipe! :::CHEERS:::

cocktail_reviews.Name: Ultimate Frozen Strawberry Margarita
cocktail_reviews.Review: Tried this recipe last night and it was fabulous! I did sub Grand Marnier for the triple sec and my own frozen berries with a simple syrup for the store-bought frozen berries, but I'm sure it would have been fine as written. My husband and I both loved it and will definitely be making it again!

cocktail_reviews.Name: Ultimate Frozen Strawberry Margarita
cocktail_reviews.Review: this is soooooo good!! didnt add the tequila..but still had that great taste! :) thanks.

cocktail_reviews.Name: Ultimate Frozen Strawberry Margarita
cocktail_reviews.Review: I'm not old enough to drink but my mom made this without alcohol for my brothers and I and we just loved it!

cocktail_reviews.Name: Ultimate Frozen Strawberry Margarita
cocktail_reviews.Review: Wow! Refreshing, tasty and very easy. Of course, I used more alcohol than called for in the recipe. :)

cocktail_reviews.Name: Ultimate Frozen Strawberry Margarita
cocktail_reviews.Review: Wow, excellent flavor! Very strong though. I had to add more strawberries and limeade, but if you like a strong margarita, you will love this recipe.

cocktail_reviews.Name: Ultimate Frozen Strawberry Margarita
cocktail_reviews.Review: Great recipe... tweaked slightly. Used 6 ounces Simply Lime limeade (not frozen or from concentrate) and used "two handfuls" of frozen strawberries (no syrup). I made it once with tequila, but the second time I substituted the tequila with Cruzan strawberry rum (which everyone preferred), and I added 2 ounces of orange juice. Talk about delicious! Thanks!

cocktail_reviews.Name: Ultimate Frozen Strawberry Margarita
cocktail_reviews.Review: fantastic...

cocktail_reviews.Name: Ultimate Frozen Strawberry Margarita
cocktail_reviews.Review: I agree, I would'nt change a thing. Delicious !!!

cocktail_reviews.Name: Ultimate Frozen Strawberry Margarita
cocktail_reviews.Review: Great base recipe easy to remember! I substituted Grand Marnier for the triple sec and frozen whole berries not in syrup that I had in freezer. Yummy

cocktail_reviews.Name: Ultimate Frozen Strawberry Margarita
cocktail_reviews.Review: I make this recipe and it is good but becomes "OUT of THIS WORLD" with eliminating the Triple Sec and adding 1oz. of Orange Extract, Wow!! Then top it with homemade whipped cream and a mint leaf from the garden coated with some of the powdered sugar.The Orange Extract to me adds the little thing that seems to be missing.

cocktail_reviews.Name: Ultimate Frozen Strawberry Margarita
cocktail_reviews.Review: They tasted really good, but I felt they didn't have enough alcohol. I was drinking before trying these, and by the time I got half way done with mine, I had already sobered up. They were also very thick, so you couldn't really drink them so much as eat them. My fiance abandoned his entirely. If I try making them again I'll definitely be adding more alcohol. Hopefully that will make them a little less thick.

cocktail_reviews.Name: Ultimate Frozen Strawberry Margarita
cocktail_reviews.Review: these are great!

cocktail_reviews.Name: Ultimate Frozen Strawberry Margarita
cocktail_reviews.Review: This REALY is the ULTIMATE margarita! It was very tasty, simple, and the ingredients were easy to find! I'll definitely keep this one around for next new years!!

cocktail_reviews.Name: Ultimate Frozen Strawberry Margarita
cocktail_reviews.Review: I used frozen raspberries instead because my friend doesn't like strawberries. Kept everything else the same; these were phenomenal!! Strong, but yummy enough to hide it :)

cocktail_reviews.Name: Ultimate Frozen Strawberry Margarita
cocktail_reviews.Review: made these for some friends last night, they were a hit! they were amazing! thank you :)

cocktail_reviews.Name: Ultimate Frozen Strawberry Margarita
cocktail_reviews.Review: My favorite margaritas! I've been meaning to review this for quite some time. After I made these once a couple of years ago, they became my signature contribution to potlucks and parties. I rim my glasses with granulated sugar instead of powdered, though I must say, I haven't actually tried the latter. You just can't go wrong with these!

cocktail_reviews.Name: Ultimate Frozen Strawberry Margarita
cocktail_reviews.Review: I did it a little different and added all the ingredients and then filled the remainder of the blender with ice and blended. I thought the taste of the limeade was too much. I think one blender full will do for the night...so next time I will try cutting down the limeade to 2 fluid ounces.

cocktail_reviews.Name: Ultimate Frozen Strawberry Margarita
cocktail_reviews.Review: OMG!! Yummy. I thought my recipe was good but this was far better!! My husband absolutely loved the flavor, and the kick was awesome too!! I added a little more tequila and triple sec but it did not take away from the flavor!

cocktail_reviews.Name: Ultimate Frozen Strawberry Margarita
cocktail_reviews.Review: I'm writing my review as I sip! (And sip, and sip...). I happened to have one of those bucket margarita mixes already made, with tequila, etc. But I don't care for the bucket mixture or the texture of the ice when it isn't blended. So I put the frozen mixture in the blender with fresh strawberries and some added ice and voila! I definitely think fresh strawberries make a difference. This will be a weekend regular!

cocktail_reviews.Name: Ultimate Frozen Strawberry Margarita
cocktail_reviews.Review: by far one of the best margaritas. i used fresh halved strawberries with sugar which i let stand for about an hour and then froze them. i didn't have triple sec but had peach schnapps i also had lemonade concentrate instead of the limeade. it still tasted awesome....thanks for the recipe, this will be my go to margarita recipe :)

cocktail_reviews.Name: Ultimate Frozen Strawberry Margarita
cocktail_reviews.Review: Made these for a crowd & everyone thought they were tasty. Not exactly lilke you get in a restaurant - different - but just as good.

cocktail_reviews.Name: Ultimate Frozen Strawberry Margarita
cocktail_reviews.Review: I've made margaritas many times and this is now my favorite recipe. The store bought mixes don't even compare! Perfect!

cocktail_reviews.Name: Ultimate Frozen Strawberry Margarita
cocktail_reviews.Review: ULTIMATE IS CORRECT!! Me and my boyfriend made a pitcher last Saturday and we liked it so much we did it again the next day! We are strawberry lovers so we used more than the 8oz it calls for in the recipe. (We used about 12oz.) Also, just this past weekend for my girlfriends, I used this recipe even without the strawberries. So I might try even other fruits to use....mmmmm.... maybe Mangos!

cocktail_reviews.Name: Ultimate Frozen Strawberry Margarita
cocktail_reviews.Review: EXCELLENT!!! This was a spur of the moment choice on a steamy day this summer. What a pleasure! This recipe is a keeper and something I will serve my friends and (continue making for myself)! lol

cocktail_reviews.Name: Ultimate Frozen Strawberry Margarita
cocktail_reviews.Review: AWESOME!!!!!!!!!

cocktail_reviews.Name: Ultimate Frozen Strawberry Margarita
cocktail_reviews.Review: Great recipe, will be it using over and over again!!!!

cocktail_reviews.Name: Ultimate Frozen Strawberry Margarita
cocktail_reviews.Review: Nice margarita! Although not the best margarita I've ever made or consumed, this is a decent homemade version nonetheless. My only "gripe" is that the strawberry flavor was somewhat lacking (it's very subtle, IMHO). I think I'll tinker with the ratio of frozen strawberries next time to see what I can come up with. :) TIP: Moisten the rim of you glass with a lime wedge or cut strawberry half, THEN dip in sugar (powdered, granulated or large crystals). The fruit does double duty.... Not only does it allow the sugar to adhere to your glass (the fruit "juice" is sticky), it also serves as a cute garnish! Thanks for sharing, JTWTECH! You made taco night yum-o. :-)

cocktail_reviews.Name: Ultimate Frozen Strawberry Margarita
cocktail_reviews.Review: Was invited to a margarita loving fiends house to soak in her new hot tub....made these Strawberry Margaritas and they were a big hit! Added a bit less tequila and used fresh picked strawberries, they were awesome! The flavor from the limeade was just right. Don't know what was more relaxing, the long soak in the hot tub or these wonderful cocktails! Will def make these again! Midnight Margaritas anyone?!

cocktail_reviews.Name: Ultimate Frozen Strawberry Margarita
cocktail_reviews.Review: I'm drinking this right now and it's strong as, well let's just say I'm on they way to a long nap. It tastes great, looks great, and packs a powerful punch. I was going to make it again tomorrow, but I don't think I can handle this sandman for two consecutive days. Beware: it's delicsh!

cocktail_reviews.Name: Ultimate Frozen Strawberry Margarita
cocktail_reviews.Review: This was a good recipe but I'd cut down a little o both alcohols, I like my drinks sting but these are Too strong. Thanks for the recipe

cocktail_reviews.Name: Ultimate Frozen Strawberry Margarita
cocktail_reviews.Review: Made these for a 4th of July party last night. Planned on making a couple of pitchers and ended up having to run to the store and get more LimeAde because we went through MANY pitchers!! This is by far one of the tastiest Margaritas I have ever had! But be warned, it really packs a punch!!!

cocktail_reviews.Name: Ultimate Frozen Strawberry Margarita
cocktail_reviews.Review: This was amazing. Used fresh strawberries because we were trying to use them up, and there were perfect chunks of berries in the drink. We plan on drinking this all summer long!!

cocktail_reviews.Name: Ultimate Frozen Strawberry Margarita
cocktail_reviews.Review: Oh ya, come to Momma.

cocktail_reviews.Name: Ultimate Frozen Strawberry Margarita
cocktail_reviews.Review: OMG!!! I am in love!! I have searched for a good margarita recipe for a year! This is the absolute best!!! I'm so happy I found it!!!

cocktail_reviews.Name: Ultimate Frozen Strawberry Margarita
cocktail_reviews.Review: Perfect!

cocktail_reviews.Name: Ultimate Frozen Strawberry Margarita
cocktail_reviews.Review: these are excellent and just the most perfect taste. I've made them before without the lime concentrate and that is exactle what was missing. The lime concentrate is what makes them perfect. YUM YUM!!!

cocktail_reviews.Name: Ultimate Frozen Strawberry Margarita
cocktail_reviews.Review: Easy to make! Tasty as all get out! No need for the sugar on the glass rim, but it looks great.

cocktail_reviews.Name: Ultimate Frozen Strawberry Margarita
cocktail_reviews.Review: I used fresh strawberries instead frozen and it was PERFECT. Will be making this again, and again, and again!

cocktail_reviews.Name: Ultimate Frozen Strawberry Margarita
cocktail_reviews.Review: This recipe is so delicious. I can not wait to try other flavors. THANK YOU!!!!!

cocktail_reviews.Name: Ultimate Frozen Strawberry Margarita
cocktail_reviews.Review: They were absolutely amazing. I decided to only use frozen fruit to avoid the watering down that usually happens and they were gone in a flash. We loved the combination of strawberries & mango.

cocktail_reviews.Name: Ultimate Frozen Strawberry Margarita
cocktail_reviews.Review: perfect...though I used fresh strawberries blended with about a 1/4 cup of powdered sugar.

cocktail_reviews.Name: Ultimate Frozen Strawberry Margarita
cocktail_reviews.Review: Very yummy! Made it for a party and everyone loved it.

cocktail_reviews.Name: Ultimate Frozen Strawberry Margarita
cocktail_reviews.Review: This is truly the ultimate frozen strawberry margarita. Its rare that I have no alterations, but I truly don't think anything could improve upon this recipe. Bravo!

cocktail_reviews.Name: Ultimate Frozen Strawberry Margarita
cocktail_reviews.Review: followed recipes exactly--EVERYONE DRANK MANY AND RAVED. went perfect with jalapeno poppers spread with chips recipe that everyone also LOVED!!!!!

cocktail_reviews.Name: Ultimate Frozen Strawberry Margarita
cocktail_reviews.Review: This is the best we have ever had...I get so many compliments and requests when we get together with friends....thanks so much for this recipie!!!!

cocktail_reviews.Name: Ultimate Frozen Strawberry Margarita
cocktail_reviews.Review: This is by far the best Strawberry Margarita I have ever made. I accidentally added 6 oz of the limeade but we will be making these over and over.

cocktail_reviews.Name: Ultimate Frozen Strawberry Margarita
cocktail_reviews.Review: Delicious! Read MOST HELPFUL reviews for good tips! Yum!

cocktail_reviews.Name: Ultimate Frozen Strawberry Margarita
cocktail_reviews.Review: Uber-yum! I made this drink for a "Girls' Night In" and they were a big hit (the words "fabulous" and "delicious" were used liberally)! I did tweak the recipe recipe a bit, though. I used a 10 fl oz bag of frozen strawberries (no syrup), substituted half a cup (or so) of Rose's sweetened lime juice for the frozen limeade concentrate and added about half a cup of sugar. This drink is a PERFECT addition to any party. My friends loved their margaritas and can't wait to have them again!

cocktail_reviews.Name: Ultimate Frozen Strawberry Margarita
cocktail_reviews.Review: Tried this one with frozen rasberries and it turned out great also!

cocktail_reviews.Name: Ultimate Frozen Strawberry Margarita
cocktail_reviews.Review: This is how I've been making my margaritas for years! I tend not to measure things out, so some batches are a bit stronger than others. I've also tried it with frozen mango pieces which worked pretty well

cocktail_reviews.Name: Ultimate Frozen Strawberry Margarita
cocktail_reviews.Review: Awesome! I prefer these to any I've had at restaurants.

cocktail_reviews.Name: Ultimate Frozen Strawberry Margarita
cocktail_reviews.Review: MAGNIFICENT PERFECT AWESOME

cocktail_reviews.Name: Ultimate Frozen Strawberry Margarita
cocktail_reviews.Review: MAGNIFICENT PERFECT AWESOME

cocktail_reviews.Name: Ultimate Frozen Strawberry Margarita
cocktail_reviews.Review: Had some friends and family over for a cookout and they all LOVED these, now I am asked to make these every time we get together. They ARE the Ultimate Margarita!!

cocktail_reviews.Name: Ultimate Frozen Strawberry Margarita
cocktail_reviews.Review: Stop looking, because THIS IS IT - the BEST frozen strawberry margarita ever. After trying many, many recipes that didn't come close to what I wanted, I came across this...and in 5 minutes I had the delicious, elusive concoction I've been seeking for so long. ENJOY!

cocktail_reviews.Name: Ultimate Frozen Strawberry Margarita
cocktail_reviews.Review: Yum Yum Yum! I don't even like margaritas or tequila but this was so good. I took the advice of another reviewer and got good tequila (Jose Cuervo) since there is so much in this drink. I'll definitely be making this again!

cocktail_reviews.Name: Ultimate Frozen Strawberry Margarita
cocktail_reviews.Review: This was perfect! I made this for a BBQ & everyone (even the guys!) loved this easy to make, refreshing drink! Yum! Thanks for sharing!

cocktail_reviews.Name: Ultimate Frozen Strawberry Margarita
cocktail_reviews.Review: We LOVED this! I have a pretty large blender, so when it says to fill a blender with ice, I think we had to increase the other ingredients accordingly. We ended up using the same amount of tequila and triple sec, but increased the strawberries to 16oz and the limeade concentrate to 6oz. This is just like the strawberry margaritas at our favorite Mexican restaurant in town, we will definitely be making this again and again!!!

cocktail_reviews.Name: Ultimate Frozen Strawberry Margarita
cocktail_reviews.Review: Perfection! Had a ton of fresh strawberries, so added three cups of these instead of the frozen. Needed to add 1/4 sugar to sweeten the pitcher. Also substitued Grand Marnier for the triple sec. Superior ingredients produce superior results!

cocktail_reviews.Name: Ultimate Frozen Strawberry Margarita
cocktail_reviews.Review: Perfection! Had a ton of fresh strawberries, so added three cups of these instead of the frozen. Needed to add 1/4 sugar to sweeten the pitcher. Also substitued Grand Marnier for the triple sec. Superior ingredients produce superior results!

cocktail_reviews.Name: Ultimate Frozen Strawberry Margarita
cocktail_reviews.Review: This Margarita was soooooo yummy. The only thing that I did different was, instead of using 6oz of Tequila, I used 4oz. The 6oz made it too strong. The tequila that I used was Jose Cuervo Gold. I could not find the strawberries with syrup so i used frozen strawberries with sugar. You might also want to add strawberry syrup to make it sweeter. Overall great recipe.

cocktail_reviews.Name: Ultimate Frozen Strawberry Margarita
cocktail_reviews.Review: These were awesome. I might add some sugar next time though.

cocktail_reviews.Name: Ultimate Frozen Strawberry Margarita
cocktail_reviews.Review: Delicious, but tart! Will make again, but I will add some sugar next time. Easy and refreshing.

cocktail_reviews.Name: Ultimate Frozen Strawberry Margarita
cocktail_reviews.Review: Had a party and everyone loved these. I made slight variation keeped the amount of alcohol the same, but used Gran Gala instead of triple sec its higher quality, added 8-12 oz unsweetened strawberries because that is what I had, so I added 1/8-1/4 sugar. And added only 3 oz of limeade. And added enough water so it would blend. It was so popular that we ran out of tequila we made 5 batches so if your having a party make sure you have lots of strawberries, tequila, and ice!

cocktail_reviews.Name: Ultimate Frozen Strawberry Margarita
cocktail_reviews.Review: This is a very good recipe. But I created one way to make it better, use Strawberry Dole Fruit Bars to make the margarita more slushy. This is good because they are only 90 calories per bar and are all natural. You only need half a bar per drink. I love serving them at family get togethers!!

cocktail_reviews.Name: Ultimate Frozen Strawberry Margarita
cocktail_reviews.Review: These are so yummy! I will never buy a mix again. I made it with a cup fresh sliced strawberries and a little sugar. Definitely a keeper!

cocktail_reviews.Name: Ultimate Frozen Strawberry Margarita
cocktail_reviews.Review: These are good but did not impress me or the wife enough to get five stars.

cocktail_reviews.Name: Ultimate Frozen Strawberry Margarita
cocktail_reviews.Review: Wow! Best homemade margarita ever! My whole family loved this recipe!

cocktail_reviews.Name: Ultimate Frozen Strawberry Margarita
cocktail_reviews.Review: there is no way this is for 4 people! I had a big glass and filled it to the brim! Awesome!!

cocktail_reviews.Name: Ultimate Frozen Strawberry Margarita
cocktail_reviews.Review: There wasn't anything remarkable about this margarita recipe. I needed to double the amount of strawberries in order to draw out some strawberry taste. I don't think I will use again. Thanks anyway.

cocktail_reviews.Name: Ultimate Frozen Strawberry Margarita
cocktail_reviews.Review: Have made this recipe for many years.....exactly and with no changes. If it ain't broke, don't fix it. Outrageously wonderful.

cocktail_reviews.Name: Ultimate Frozen Strawberry Margarita
cocktail_reviews.Review: Pretty good

cocktail_reviews.Name: Ultimate Frozen Strawberry Margarita
cocktail_reviews.Review: Awesome as is! You can't beat this recipe. Quick, easy, and very yummy. It is a summer staple around my house.

cocktail_reviews.Name: Ultimate Frozen Strawberry Margarita
cocktail_reviews.Review: Wonderful!!! A big hit at our party! Just the right amounts of everything. Will definitely make this again!

cocktail_reviews.Name: Ultimate Frozen Strawberry Margarita
cocktail_reviews.Review: WOW!!! This is sooooo Gooood and so easy. Will never buy the premixed stuff again. Tastes just like a restaurant.

cocktail_reviews.Name: Ultimate Frozen Strawberry Margarita
cocktail_reviews.Review: Wow...Never again will I buy the pre-mixed variety! These were so, so, so good! Very easy and super yummy. It scares me that I would have had no problem finishing the entire pitcher on my own! Ha.

cocktail_reviews.Name: Ultimate Frozen Strawberry Margarita
cocktail_reviews.Review: I would highly recommend these to anyone who enjoys margaritas you get in a restaurant. They taste very similar. I used about half the alcohol called for and some still felt they were a bit strong. I thought they were perfect . Thanks very much for the recipe. They were a delicious addition to ladies night!

cocktail_reviews.Name: Ultimate Frozen Strawberry Margarita
cocktail_reviews.Review: We usually use mix but wanted to try "real" margaritas this time. These were EXCELLENT!!! Thanks so much!

cocktail_reviews.Name: Ultimate Frozen Strawberry Margarita
cocktail_reviews.Review: OMG!!! BE CAREFUL!!! these yummy drinks sneak up on ya!!! ;)

cocktail_reviews.Name: Ultimate Frozen Strawberry Margarita
cocktail_reviews.Review: Awesome! Me and my husband made some for New Years Eve! Delicious this is now my favorite strawberry margarita recipe.

cocktail_reviews.Name: Ultimate Frozen Strawberry Margarita
cocktail_reviews.Review: OH MY!! Me and my husband love this drink recipe! You are right it is in deed near perfect. I had friends over and they couldn't believe I didn't make them from a pre-mixed bottle. Served it with some yummy enchiladas.

cocktail_reviews.Name: Ultimate Frozen Strawberry Margarita
cocktail_reviews.Review: This is almost exactly how my parents make their regular magaritas, just omit the strawberries. You could also substitute frozen mangos, blackberries, whatever you like for the strawberries!

cocktail_reviews.Name: Ultimate Frozen Strawberry Margarita
cocktail_reviews.Review: Definitely a fav!

cocktail_reviews.Name: Ultimate Frozen Strawberry Margarita
cocktail_reviews.Review: Love these margaritas! I used Cointreau instead of Triple Sec because I had it in the house. Some of my girlfriends thought they were a bit strong, but I thought they were perfect. (They still finished them off though!)

cocktail_reviews.Name: Ultimate Frozen Strawberry Margarita
cocktail_reviews.Review: This is a great margarita recipe! The ratio of friut to alcohol is perfect :)

cocktail_reviews.Name: Ultimate Frozen Strawberry Margarita
cocktail_reviews.Review: Love love these. it's great to be able to make this drink just as good as the resturants do.

cocktail_reviews.Name: Ultimate Frozen Strawberry Margarita
cocktail_reviews.Review: I would give this recipe more stars if I could. I usually drink my margaritas on the rocks....not anymore. This recipe will be the one I make from now on when having company over. Everyone loves these margaritas. Thank you, JTWTECH!

cocktail_reviews.Name: Ultimate Frozen Strawberry Margarita
cocktail_reviews.Review: Loved these margaritas - even my husband did and he never drinks frozen ones.

cocktail_reviews.Name: Ultimate Frozen Strawberry Margarita
cocktail_reviews.Review: Great strawberry taste that's not too sweet, and super easy to make. No changes necessary - this one's a keeper!

cocktail_reviews.Name: Ultimate Frozen Strawberry Margarita
cocktail_reviews.Review: Perfect as written! Plan on enough supplies for a few pitchers!

cocktail_reviews.Name: Ultimate Frozen Strawberry Margarita
cocktail_reviews.Review: These were DELICIOUS!

cocktail_reviews.Name: Ultimate Frozen Strawberry Margarita
cocktail_reviews.Review: Awesome! Best strawberry margarita, by far. Just make sure the strawberries and sauce are pretty melted. Mine were too frozen and with the ice and frozen concentrate, the blender wouldn't turn enough and the drinks came out too thick. Next batch was perfect after the strawberries had defrosted.

cocktail_reviews.Name: Ultimate Frozen Strawberry Margarita
cocktail_reviews.Review: This is an AWESOME recipe!!! I think I oculd become a bartender with recipes like this. We used sugar on the rim of the glasses and it was great....good to the very last drop (or lick!)

cocktail_reviews.Name: Ultimate Frozen Strawberry Margarita
cocktail_reviews.Review: Fantastic! Followed prior review and added liquids to blender then filled with ice and blended...perfect! Highly recommend this recipe...

cocktail_reviews.Name: Ultimate Frozen Strawberry Margarita
cocktail_reviews.Review: Perfect! I threw in a handful of hulled and halved berries and added the juice of half a lime to give it real "freshness." A winner all the way around!

cocktail_reviews.Name: Ultimate Frozen Strawberry Margarita
cocktail_reviews.Review: This is the BEST! We have a Margaritaville machine, and they were perfect. Better than any margarita we have had....

cocktail_reviews.Name: Ultimate Frozen Strawberry Margarita
cocktail_reviews.Review: These margaritas rock! I made these this evening and the only change I made was to put in the entire 16 oz container of sliced strawberries rather than just half (8oz). I also added about another ounce of the lime-ade. I will definitely make these again when friends are over! Thanks for sharing the recipe!

cocktail_reviews.Name: Ultimate Frozen Strawberry Margarita
cocktail_reviews.Review: I absolutely loved this recipe. I rimmed my glasses with sugar, and was not disappointed. I woke up this morning with an almost hangover!!

cocktail_reviews.Name: Ultimate Frozen Strawberry Margarita
cocktail_reviews.Review: Very, very good! I used frozen strawberries and added a little simple syrup to sweeten it up a bit. I rimmed one glass with salt and another with granulated sugar. I preferred the sugar over the salt. This was better than most restaurant margaritas. Give it a try!

cocktail_reviews.Name: Ultimate Frozen Strawberry Margarita
cocktail_reviews.Review: LOVED it! So easy, and turned out perfect!

cocktail_reviews.Name: Ultimate Frozen Strawberry Margarita
cocktail_reviews.Review: Awesome! I followed the recipe exactly and everyone loved it! Can't wait to make this again.

cocktail_reviews.Name: Ultimate Frozen Strawberry Margarita
cocktail_reviews.Review: Terrific!

cocktail_reviews.Name: Ultimate Frozen Strawberry Margarita
cocktail_reviews.Review: This is The Best receipe out there! And if you do not have triple sec you can just add more tequila and it is still Unbelievable. Thanks for sharing this little jem!

cocktail_reviews.Name: Ultimate Frozen Strawberry Margarita
cocktail_reviews.Review: I triple the recipe & make it all in the limeade can. (1 1/2 cans of tequila, one can of limeade, 1/2 can of triple sec & 24 oz of frozen strawberries.) I make the mix ahead of time in a pitcher & throw it in the fridge. When it's time for a party - I use my Margarita maker & blend it with ice (makes 3 pitchers of margaritas). It's AWESOME and people ask for the recipe constantly. Thanks so much - it's our go-to party recipe!

cocktail_reviews.Name: Ultimate Frozen Strawberry Margarita
cocktail_reviews.Review: These are so great! And they go quick on a hot day! They taste just like the margs at a local Mexican Restaurant in our area and they are hard to beat!

cocktail_reviews.Name: Ultimate Frozen Strawberry Margarita
cocktail_reviews.Review: Awesome margaritas! I made these for my husband and I on Cinco de Mayo and they were fabulous! A little on the sweet side, but I thought it was just right. Will definately be making this recipe in the future. Thanks!

cocktail_reviews.Name: Ultimate Frozen Strawberry Margarita
cocktail_reviews.Review: I did not care for this recipe. I'm sorry, but after adding an entire package of frozen strawberries to try to dilute the extreme syrupy flavor of this, it was still waaaaaaay too sweet. Not to mention the alcohol content was about 4x what it should have been.

cocktail_reviews.Name: Ultimate Frozen Strawberry Margarita
cocktail_reviews.Review: Soooo good! A little strong, but that's easy to fix, I threw some ice and more strawberries in. I made strawberry mango margaritas by adding frozen mango and mango nectare. They came out great too!

cocktail_reviews.Name: Ultimate Frozen Strawberry Margarita
cocktail_reviews.Review: Very good! Made 4 pitchers full tonight and had we not been too tipsy to drive to the store for more tequila it would have been more. Will keep supplies on hand for summer days by the pool. Yummy

cocktail_reviews.Name: Ultimate Frozen Strawberry Margarita
cocktail_reviews.Review: I wish I was part of the majority here, but I did not enjoy these margaritas. I used regular frozen strawberries and without the syrup, these were plenty sweet. Over-sweet actually. I used good tequila and triple sec, so perhaps a different limeade would help. Thanks for the recipe though.

cocktail_reviews.Name: Ultimate Frozen Strawberry Margarita
cocktail_reviews.Review: We were wowed by this recipe. We used fresh strawberries and added a few tablespoons of fresh lime. TOO good!!

cocktail_reviews.Name: Ultimate Frozen Strawberry Margarita
cocktail_reviews.Review: Great margarita!!! Just perfect the way it is, I didn't change anything.

cocktail_reviews.Name: Ultimate Frozen Strawberry Margarita
cocktail_reviews.Review: Really good!! I had fresh strawberries, so I used about a cup and a half and maybe a tablespoon of fine sugar since I was missing the syrup.

cocktail_reviews.Name: Ultimate Frozen Strawberry Margarita
cocktail_reviews.Review: These are the bomb! The only thing we changed on the recipe was double everything!

cocktail_reviews.Name: Ultimate Frozen Strawberry Margarita
cocktail_reviews.Review: I have tried making other straw marg from other recipes here on this site as well as with mixes and can never find one that I like...and I like margaritas!! THIS ONE however, tastes like one at a mexican restaurant. I LOVE IT. The only thing I did different was I only had whole frozen strawberries and I added a little sugar in the blender with it... Hubby said I added too much sugar, I thought it was just right...I added about 1/4 cup. I will definitely keep this recipe. THANK YOU!!

cocktail_reviews.Name: Ultimate Frozen Strawberry Margarita
cocktail_reviews.Review: So good! I don't see the need to change a thing but I did add some more ice to ours. Delicious!

cocktail_reviews.Name: Ultimate Frozen Strawberry Margarita
cocktail_reviews.Review: So good! I made a pitcher using frozen strawberries that I had picked this summer. My husband really liked them too. I plan on making again for a game night.

cocktail_reviews.Name: Ultimate Frozen Strawberry Margarita
cocktail_reviews.Review: WOW, what a great drink. I halved the alcohol since people were saying it "sneaks up on you". This was absolutely delicious. What a great way to try out my new blender!

cocktail_reviews.Name: Ultimate Frozen Strawberry Margarita
cocktail_reviews.Review: Wow...good stuff! Thanks

cocktail_reviews.Name: Ultimate Frozen Strawberry Margarita
cocktail_reviews.Review: I always get requests to make these great drinks. My husband and I cut back on them for fear we were drinking too much! lol

cocktail_reviews.Name: Ultimate Frozen Strawberry Margarita
cocktail_reviews.Review: The best!!!!

cocktail_reviews.Name: Ultimate Frozen Strawberry Margarita
cocktail_reviews.Review: This is a really good recipe. Had to use frozen strawberries since I didn't have any in syrup so we just added some sugar and these turned out perfect!!

cocktail_reviews.Name: Ultimate Frozen Strawberry Margarita
cocktail_reviews.Review: Wow, I'm on my second pitcher tonight...woohoo....Love em! I used powdered sugar on the rim and I think that is the way to go!

cocktail_reviews.Name: Ultimate Frozen Strawberry Margarita
cocktail_reviews.Review: I have to agree that this is awesome!! The only thing I changed (on accident) was that I doubled the strawberries. So, the second time I made this I put just the 8 oz of strawberries, but then ended up doubling them again. I like it better that way. Yummy! My husband says these are better than the restaurants serve, too!

cocktail_reviews.Name: Ultimate Frozen Strawberry Margarita
cocktail_reviews.Review: These Margaritas are great. Thank you for submitting this recipe.

cocktail_reviews.Name: Ultimate Frozen Strawberry Margarita
cocktail_reviews.Review: Good, but definitely not the best I've ever had and I rarely drink alcohol. I made them for a dinner party and everyone said they were good, but needed something more, but we just couldn't place it. On the plus side, you couldn't taste the alcohol so they went down easy!

cocktail_reviews.Name: Ultimate Frozen Strawberry Margarita
cocktail_reviews.Review: Seriously.. THE best!

cocktail_reviews.Name: Ultimate Frozen Strawberry Margarita
cocktail_reviews.Review: Made it a Mockarita! This was great, since we are non drinkers I subsituted the tequilla with guava nectar and the triple sec with orange juice and it was FABULOUS!

cocktail_reviews.Name: Ultimate Frozen Strawberry Margarita
cocktail_reviews.Review: This recipe is awesome!! I prefer mine on the tangy sid so I used frozen strawberries without the syrup.

cocktail_reviews.Name: Ultimate Frozen Strawberry Margarita
cocktail_reviews.Review: These are good, but not extraordinary.

cocktail_reviews.Name: Ultimate Frozen Strawberry Margarita
cocktail_reviews.Review: These are awesome, everyone loved them! Whatever you do, DON'T drink so many you lose count!

cocktail_reviews.Name: Ultimate Frozen Strawberry Margarita
cocktail_reviews.Review: Excellent. I made these in our margarita machine and they were fantastic. Guests raved and asked for the recipe. This is now our house rita. Love the powdered sugar touch!

cocktail_reviews.Name: Ultimate Frozen Strawberry Margarita
cocktail_reviews.Review: This is SO SO good. However, after trying it a few times, I've started cutting back the tequilla to 1/2 cup (4 oz.), otherwise it tends to sneak up on you too fast! :)

cocktail_reviews.Name: Ultimate Frozen Strawberry Margarita
cocktail_reviews.Review: Made it just as written & it was wonderful; definitely comparable to a restaurant version but much cheaper!

cocktail_reviews.Name: Ultimate Frozen Strawberry Margarita
cocktail_reviews.Review: I'm not a tequilla fan but this is one great drink. Perfect for the patio!

cocktail_reviews.Name: Ultimate Frozen Strawberry Margarita
cocktail_reviews.Review: These are great! I like that the frozen strawberries added a real fruit taste, but the syrup made them sweet too. Not sugary like the frozen mixes you get at the store, delicious more like the ones you order at a good restaurant.

cocktail_reviews.Name: Ultimate Frozen Strawberry Margarita
cocktail_reviews.Review: Wow, this was yummy! I used fresh strawberries though. Strong, but gooood!

cocktail_reviews.Name: Ultimate Frozen Strawberry Margarita
cocktail_reviews.Review: Okay, this was awesome, as good as any I've had in restaurants! I'm still a little tipsy, since I polished off the pitcher! Thanks for a wonderful recipe which will be used again and again!

cocktail_reviews.Name: Ultimate Frozen Strawberry Margarita
cocktail_reviews.Review: Yes, very good recipe. This cocktail is one of my favorite. Now I am not ordering strawberry margarita in a bar.

cocktail_reviews.Name: Ultimate Frozen Strawberry Margarita
cocktail_reviews.Review: Perfect!!

cocktail_reviews.Name: Ultimate Frozen Strawberry Margarita
cocktail_reviews.Review: Went down soooo smoothly. Yum. Easy recipe and turned out perfectly. My guests raved.

cocktail_reviews.Name: Ultimate Frozen Strawberry Margarita
cocktail_reviews.Review: Absolutely yummy. This will be "our" margarita recipe from now on.

cocktail_reviews.Name: Ultimate Frozen Strawberry Margarita
cocktail_reviews.Review: Wow! These are perfect, I wouldn't change a thing about them. We served them at our New Year's Eve party and they were such a hit, even the men were drinking them!

cocktail_reviews.Name: Ultimate Frozen Strawberry Margarita
cocktail_reviews.Review: This was pretty good. But next time I would add less limeade and more strawberries (but then again I'm a huge strawberry fan and not so much of a lime fan).

cocktail_reviews.Name: Ultimate Frozen Strawberry Margarita
cocktail_reviews.Review: Just like in a restaurant... made for a ridiculous night!

cocktail_reviews.Name: Ultimate Frozen Strawberry Margarita
cocktail_reviews.Review: Sorry to say, that this recipe may bring me to alcoholism. This is the way Margaritas should be. Now, instead of paying $8 for a restaurant to mess my drink up...I come home to this one, perfect every time!!

cocktail_reviews.Name: Ultimate Frozen Strawberry Margarita
cocktail_reviews.Review: Thanks for this recipe...they were Excellent! And they are great to make the night before. Just store in a freezer safe pitcher! I made these the night before a party (quadrupled the recipe to make a big pitcher full) and just stored in the freezer the night before. I took them out 1 hour before guests arrived and they were the perfect slushy consistency! I was informed by everyone that I am now in charge of the margaritas for every party we have!

cocktail_reviews.Name: Ultimate Frozen Strawberry Margarita
cocktail_reviews.Review: It sounds great but i have a quick question... I'm a minor and I don't drink alcohol. What would i replace the taquilla with to make this a virgin margarita.

cocktail_reviews.Name: Ultimate Frozen Strawberry Margarita
cocktail_reviews.Review: Tasted really good, these margaritas helped bring the dinner party to life. I did not have strawberries in syrup so I just added a half a cup of suger syrup (1/4 c of water heated on the stove with 1/4 c of suger until the granules dissolve, chilled in the fridge.) I also used fresh squezed limes instead of the frozen concentrate.

cocktail_reviews.Name: Ultimate Frozen Strawberry Margarita
cocktail_reviews.Review: Turned out perfectly, couldn't ask for more.

cocktail_reviews.Name: Ultimate Frozen Strawberry Margarita
cocktail_reviews.Review: Very good strawberry Margarita, and I can not stand the taste of tequila, but it was very smooth and couldn't even taste it. My guests said using Patron in mine probaby made the difference... I wouldn't have known better.

cocktail_reviews.Name: Ultimate Frozen Strawberry Margarita
cocktail_reviews.Review: Best Margarita I have ever had just one problem though, I Make them almost everyday!

cocktail_reviews.Name: Ultimate Frozen Strawberry Margarita
cocktail_reviews.Review: This was pretty good. For a make at home recipe I really did like it. I probably won't make it again because I would rather just have a regular margarita. If you really like strawberry margaritas then you will probably like this!

cocktail_reviews.Name: Ultimate Frozen Strawberry Margarita
cocktail_reviews.Review: AWESOME! We kicked it up by adding a couple of scoups of Vanilla Ice cream at the end. WOW!

cocktail_reviews.Name: Ultimate Frozen Strawberry Margarita
cocktail_reviews.Review: Wonderful, wonderful, wonderful. These were even better than the ones we get served at an authentic Mexican restaurant. I didn't use frozen strawberries-I used fresh strawberries picked from my garden. That was the only substitution that I made. They were so flavorful, and my relatives and hubby (who generally does not like margaritas) kept saying how good they were. Thanks, Jason!

cocktail_reviews.Name: Ultimate Frozen Strawberry Margarita
cocktail_reviews.Review: WOW! These were really good, but I think they are really strong too. I don't drink much and after two large glasses I was feeling pretty tipsy. I will make these again, but I will probably decrease the amount of tequila!

cocktail_reviews.Name: Ultimate Frozen Strawberry Margarita
cocktail_reviews.Review: Perfect - Used it for a bridal shower and it was a hit!

cocktail_reviews.Name: Ultimate Frozen Strawberry Margarita
cocktail_reviews.Review: Mmmm. So good. I did not make exactly as recipe states though as I like them a little less strong. I only used 4oz tequila, 2oz triple sec and then I added ice and a little extra limeade (I think about half to 3/4 of a can in total). Fantastic!

cocktail_reviews.Name: Ultimate Frozen Strawberry Margarita
cocktail_reviews.Review: These babies ROCK!! My boyfriend and I enjoyed them VERY MUCH..All we have to say is Thank You, Thank You, Thank You!!

cocktail_reviews.Name: Ultimate Frozen Strawberry Margarita
cocktail_reviews.Review: This is the best margarita i have ever made! I used frozen mixed fruit ( melons, pineapple, berries ) the second time i made it and it was great too. Thanks so much!

cocktail_reviews.Name: Ultimate Frozen Strawberry Margarita
cocktail_reviews.Review: AWESOME! Very refreshing, and the consistency is perfect! The tequila taste was pretty strong on my first sip (I used Sauza--maybe a better brand would've taken care of that). But by the time I finished half a glass, it seemed just right--so in retrospect, I'm glad I didn't splurge on an expensive tequila. (You know it's a fantastic recipe when you can get away w/ the cheaper ingredients!) Thanks for this one!

cocktail_reviews.Name: Ultimate Frozen Strawberry Margarita
cocktail_reviews.Review: Yummy!!!!

cocktail_reviews.Name: Ultimate Frozen Strawberry Margarita
cocktail_reviews.Review: Delicious! I made with frozen strawberries!

cocktail_reviews.Name: Ultimate Frozen Strawberry Margarita
cocktail_reviews.Review: Perfect!!! I just take the strawberries right out of the freezer into the blender. Soooo good. Added 11-07 My husband and I have these all the time, we love them. They cure everything : )

cocktail_reviews.Name: Ultimate Frozen Strawberry Margarita
cocktail_reviews.Review: This is a great margarita recipe. Very simple to make. The only change I would make is to use unsweetened frozen strawberries. We all agreed that they were a little too sweet.

cocktail_reviews.Name: Ultimate Frozen Strawberry Margarita
cocktail_reviews.Review: This is absolutely the best margarita I have ever tasted!!! What a way to celebrate Cinco de Mayo...or any day of the year!!!!!

cocktail_reviews.Name: Ultimate Frozen Strawberry Margarita
cocktail_reviews.Review: Awesome!!! Tasted just like the ones you get at a restaurant!! I would change nothing. We made 3 batches last night (for 4 of us) and we all raved about them. Didn't get tipsy though, like some of the other readers had. Which is good because I didn't want to get drunk. Thanks for the great recipe...the limeade really makes it the best!!

cocktail_reviews.Name: Ultimate Frozen Strawberry Margarita
cocktail_reviews.Review: I made these on sunday night for a mexican feast and they were a big hit! Great big strawberry flavor with nice tartness from the lime. My supermarket didn't have frozen limeade, so I just subbed a can of frozen margarita concentrate. I believe it was Bacardi brand and it was wonderful! I will def be making again!

cocktail_reviews.Name: Ultimate Frozen Strawberry Margarita
cocktail_reviews.Review: Oh, Man..Oh, Man..OH MAN! Can you say PASS ME THE PITCHER AND NOBODY GETS HURT?! Super recipe and highly addictive.

cocktail_reviews.Name: Ultimate Frozen Strawberry Margarita
cocktail_reviews.Review: Oh so yummy! Didn't and wouldn't change a thing....although I might try fresh strawberries when they are in season.

cocktail_reviews.Name: Ultimate Frozen Strawberry Margarita
cocktail_reviews.Review: Excellent, but didn't make 4 servings. I'll double the recipe next time. We have also made these with fresh strawberries. We eliminated the frozen strawberries and added about 12 large strawberries and a 1/4 cup of sugar. Yummy!!!!

cocktail_reviews.Name: Ultimate Frozen Strawberry Margarita
cocktail_reviews.Review: I used half tequila half limon since my husband doesn't care for tequila. Very yummy, and with those frozen berries, I didn't feel to quilty. I could tell myself it was a healthy drink (compared to those bottled mixes)

cocktail_reviews.Name: Ultimate Frozen Strawberry Margarita
cocktail_reviews.Review: This was the first thing I made during my first experience using a blender (scary). Followed everything to the letter and it turned out fantastic! I'll definitely be using this one again!

cocktail_reviews.Name: Ultimate Frozen Strawberry Margarita
cocktail_reviews.Review: These were awesome - perfect blend of ingredients and super easy. Thanks Jason!

cocktail_reviews.Name: Ultimate Frozen Strawberry Margarita
cocktail_reviews.Review: made this just now and it is awesome. hubby said just like the resturant..wouldn't change a thing..thanks for the recipe

cocktail_reviews.Name: Ultimate Frozen Strawberry Margarita
cocktail_reviews.Review: Great little recipe. I did add some Cointreau (orange liquor) for a little extra something but it certainly wasn't needed. Great as written.

cocktail_reviews.Name: Ultimate Frozen Strawberry Margarita
cocktail_reviews.Review: These were great. I added a shot of orange liqueur for an added citrus flavor!

cocktail_reviews.Name: Ultimate Frozen Strawberry Margarita
cocktail_reviews.Review: These are great on a hot summer day. I used Frozen Pink Lemonade Concentrate instead of limeade. Very good!!!

cocktail_reviews.Name: Ultimate Frozen Strawberry Margarita
cocktail_reviews.Review: A very nice texture with just the right amount of booze and strawberry. Great with tacos.

cocktail_reviews.Name: Ultimate Frozen Strawberry Margarita
cocktail_reviews.Review: Very, very good...I make sure to always have the frozen ingredients on hand, just in case!

cocktail_reviews.Name: Ultimate Frozen Strawberry Margarita
cocktail_reviews.Review: Memorial Day weekend....90 degrees outside....a pitcher of slushy Frozen Strawberry Margaritas. Perfection!!! I doubled the recipe and poured into a large pitcher. The margaritas kept nice and slushy for about an hour in the fridge. The sweetness of the strawberries and the tartness of the limeade are a perfect combination. A real keeper!

cocktail_reviews.Name: Ultimate Frozen Strawberry Margarita
cocktail_reviews.Review: This is the most awesome drink. I made this for my friends one night for a scrapbook party and it was gone in no time. I'm making it again tonight for a Memorial Day picnic. Refreshing and delicious!!!

cocktail_reviews.Name: Ultimate Frozen Strawberry Margarita
cocktail_reviews.Review: The first time I made these I couldn't find limeaide at the store (it was May 5th and the limeaide was all sold out...I assume for everyone to make awesome Margaritas)...I used lime juice instead. Big Mistake...I needed to add a ton of sugar and it never turned out WOW. So...I made another batch and used the lemonaide concentrate that I had on hand and added a touch of the lime juice. It was awesome. The lemonaide/limeaid really adds that wow factor. The next batch I made (a few days later) I used Limeaide concentrate so that I could taste the recipe as posted and it was delicious!!!!

cocktail_reviews.Name: Ultimate Frozen Strawberry Margarita
cocktail_reviews.Review: This makes a wicked margarita!! Yum Yum!

cocktail_reviews.Name: Ultimate Frozen Strawberry Margarita
cocktail_reviews.Review: Awesome, Awesome, Awesome!! I really enjoyed this recipe!! However, I made it on the rocks and added a few fresh strawberries---it turned out perfect!! Thanks for the recipe, I have already passed it on to family and friends!!

cocktail_reviews.Name: Ultimate Frozen Strawberry Margarita
cocktail_reviews.Review: I like my drinks on the rocks, not frozen and heavy, so I did a combo thing. I blended all the drink ingredients and served over ice. Excellent, and a perfect consistency for me. The limeade really adds something! Once again, I polished off the whole mix myself! Will do again! Thanks!

cocktail_reviews.Name: Ultimate Frozen Strawberry Margarita
cocktail_reviews.Review: Was a BIG hit at my New Year's party. Will keep this recipe around to use again and again. Very tasty and perfect. I filled the blender to the top with ice for a slushy drink.

cocktail_reviews.Name: Ultimate Frozen Strawberry Margarita
cocktail_reviews.Review: For a Margarita, it is very good! It is certainly simple and frosty!

cocktail_reviews.Name: Ultimate Frozen Strawberry Margarita
cocktail_reviews.Review: I would like to rate this but I am too hungover aftr drinking an entire blender of these! A+
