cocktail_reviews.Name: Ultimate Frozen Strawberry Margarita
cocktail_reviews.Review: 10 STARS! One of the BEST strawberry margaritas out there :) Great flavor!

cocktail_reviews.Name: Ultimate Frozen Strawberry Margarita
cocktail_reviews.Review: Just made these on this very hot hot day!!! Absolutely as good as my favorite at Red Lobster...Great Job!!!

cocktail_reviews.Name: Ultimate Frozen Strawberry Margarita
cocktail_reviews.Review: These were great! I wouldn't change anything.

cocktail_reviews.Name: Ultimate Frozen Strawberry Margarita
cocktail_reviews.Review: WOO-HOO, these sneak up on ya! Made them last Saturday night and aside of not wanting to do much on Sunday....We loved them....great for a very HOT day! Thanks Jason!

cocktail_reviews.Name: Ultimate Frozen Strawberry Margarita
cocktail_reviews.Review: This is an AWESOME margarita!! My daughter and I drank two pitchers on a hot sunny day as we floated around in the pool. Yes, just the two of us! Made another pitcher a few days later for her and her hubby! This is definitely the drink of choice at my house!!

cocktail_reviews.Name: Ultimate Frozen Strawberry Margarita
cocktail_reviews.Review: I could drink a pitcher all to myself! This margarita rocks! I think the frozen strawberries help make it the perfect slushie-like drink. My blender works better if you put the liquids in first and then the ice. I put everything in the blender and whatever room I had left I filled with ice. I made this for a dinner party and went through 3 pitchers! (for only 4 people) Very tasty. Used salt instead of sugar on the rims of the glasses but I'm sure either way is just as good.

cocktail_reviews.Name: Ultimate Frozen Strawberry Margarita
cocktail_reviews.Review: Awesome!! This is my new drink! I did not change a thing, this is the best and easiest margarita recipe ever!

cocktail_reviews.Name: Ultimate Frozen Strawberry Margarita
cocktail_reviews.Review: VERY, VERY GOOD!!! The best frozen strawberry marg I have ever had at home and also better than a majority of the ones I've had in mexican restaurants. I did lower the tequila a bit and added 1 cup of ice cubes to the blender...just as my own personal preference.

cocktail_reviews.Name: Ultimate Frozen Strawberry Margarita
cocktail_reviews.Review: This margarita recipe was well named! It IS the ultimate. Bear in mind I'm writing this after having consumed two of these very strong drinks. A full cup of booze goes in with 3/4s of it being tequila so be sure to use a good brand. Very tasty and considerably less expensive then buying the ready to use mixes. MMMMM Think I'll have me another.

cocktail_reviews.Name: Ultimate Frozen Strawberry Margarita
cocktail_reviews.Review: my wife is a frozen strawberry Margarita connoisseur. she likes this one as well as any one available at the local cantinas.

cocktail_reviews.Name: Ultimate Frozen Strawberry Margarita
cocktail_reviews.Review: mmmmmmmmmmmmmmmmmm mm. i also used less tequilla and more triple sec, and i used a mix of powdered and granulated sugar for the rims of the glasses. This recipe makes -plenty-

cocktail_reviews.Name: Ultimate Frozen Strawberry Margarita
cocktail_reviews.Review: Bacardi Drink Mixers MOVE OVER! This recipe is WAY BETTER! i used fresh strawberries and just added a little sugar and it worked great!

cocktail_reviews.Name: Ultimate Frozen Strawberry Margarita
cocktail_reviews.Review: Ohhh yeah! I used frozen whole strawberries instead of the sliced ones in syrup. These are a Friday night tradition now!

cocktail_reviews.Name: Ultimate Frozen Strawberry Margarita
cocktail_reviews.Review: Just like the ones i've had in my favourite Mexican restaurant - have the left overs frozen in the freezer, ready for next time!

cocktail_reviews.Name: Ultimate Frozen Strawberry Margarita
cocktail_reviews.Review: Very good strawberry margarita, however I cut back on the tequilla by half because the taste was just overpowering. I added a little more triple sec to compensate. Yummy!

cocktail_reviews.Name: Ultimate Frozen Strawberry Margarita
cocktail_reviews.Review: I've been searching for a good strawberry margarita recipe, and have finally found it. I've tried ChiChi's blend where you just add ice, and it's just not the same, not even close. This is a great recipe, however I think I may add more strawberries and a smidge less limeade next time. Thank, Mimi

cocktail_reviews.Name: Ultimate Frozen Strawberry Margarita
cocktail_reviews.Review: A mexican-restaurant quality margarita. Costs a little bit to purchase all the ingredients but it's worth it. Very good for serving to company or for a summer treat. Yum.
